bin_packing.name: UR5
bin_packing.goal: packing all object in the bin

actions.pick: pick an object not in the bin, it dose not include 'place' action
actions.place: place an object on the bin
actions.push: push a 3D compressible object (not bendable) downward in the bin, hand must be empty when pushing
actions.fold: fold a 2D foldable object (not bendalbe), hand must be empty when folding
actions.out: pick an object in bin and place an object on platform. After the action, the robot hand is empty

blocksworld.name: UR5
blocksworld.goal: stacking blocks to be a target image

actions.pick-up: pick a {block} which is on the {table}
actions.unstack: pick a {block} which is on the {block}

hanoi.name: UR5
hanoi.goal: moving all disks of a source peg(left) to the target peg(right)

actions.slice: slice an {object} which is on the {any where}
